ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_psshepw | |- `' [C.] hereditary ~P A |
| 2 |  | #P_idhe | |- _I hereditary ~P A |
| 3 |  | #P_unhe1 | |- ( ( `' [C.] hereditary ~P A /\ _I hereditary ~P A ) -> ( `' [C.] u. _I ) hereditary ~P A ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- ( `' [C.] u. _I ) hereditary ~P A |
